metadata.title: CVE-2024-0562 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A use-after-free flaw was found in the Linux Kernel. When a disk isremoved, bdi_unregister is called to stop further write-back and waits forassociated delayed work to complete. However, wb_inode_writeback_end() mayschedule bandwidth estimation work after this has completed, which canresult in the timer attempting to access the recently freed bdi_writeback.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
